action.action-desc: Mr. Teague introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for an increase in the annual amount authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out comprehensive service programs for homeless veterans.

section.header: Increase in amount authorized to be appropriated for comprehensive service programs for homeless veterans
section.text: Section 2013 of title 38, United States Code, is amended—
